page.title: 06AN AYLMERTON SCHOOLBOY'S DAY
page.content: I usually get up and wash at 7.30a.m. then go downstairs and have breakfast, which is usually cornflakes. I get dressed at about 7.50a.m., and leave for{school}at about 8.15a.m. Registration at school is at 8.30a.m. and{lessons}start at 8.40a.m. School finishes at 1.00p.m. because of the teachers' dispute (school would normally finish at 3.30p.m.). When I get home, I have a sandwich and do my {homework. }Then, if the weather is fine, I go out on my cycle. Aylmerton lies in the catchment area of Cromer High School, but I prefer to go to Sheringham High School. From 4p.m., to about 5.30p.m., I watch television, and then have a cooked meal. Afterwards, I usually make use of my{computer,}eventually going to bed between 9p.m. and 10.30p.m.
